com.google.inject.tools.suite.code
Interface CodeRunner

public interface CodeRunner

The CodeRunner runs CodeSnippet objects in a separate virtual machine that also has access to the user's class files. Every Runnable will be run its in own thread.

Author:
Darren Creutz (dcreutz@gmail.com)

Nested Class Summary
static interface CodeRunner.CodeRunListener
          Interface that listeners for the CodeRunner must implement.
static class CodeRunner.NotCodeSnippetException
          An exception thrown if the CodeRunner is asked to run a non CodeSnippet object.
static class CodeRunner.NotCodeSnippetResultException
          An exception thrown if the CodeRunner received notification of a result that is not the result of a CodeSnippet.
static class CodeRunner.Runnable
          A Runnable is something the CodeRunner can run.
